formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Stack Name:
formElement.documentation: Display name of the stack to update.

formElement.label: Stack ID:
formElement.documentation: ID of the stack to update.

formElement.label: Template:
formElement.documentation: The template (in JSON or YAML format) with which to update the stack.

formElement.label: Template URL:
formElement.documentation: A URI to the location containing the updated stack template to instantiate.Specify URL only if you are not supplying template.(One should either supply the template or template URL.)

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/OpenStack/deployed).

formElement.label: Results tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other deployments stored in the same location (default is $[jobStepId]).
